alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; McIntosh; Muskogee; Pittsburg (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 10:58AM CDT until June 27 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 AM CDT FOR HASKELL...SOUTHEASTERN MCINTOSH...NORTHWESTERN LATIMER... NORTHEASTERN PITTSBURG AND SOUTHEASTERN MUSKOGEE COUNTIES... At 1058 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles southwest of Tamaha to 3 miles southwest of Lequire to 7 miles southwest of Robbers Cave State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Stigler... Quinton... Porum... Keota... Whitefield... Kinta... Briartown... Blocker... Robbers Cave State Park... Arrowhead State Park... Enterprise... Lequire... Kanima... Gowen... Featherston... Lewisville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tulsa.
